NK003(ga)002:1467: sdig sbrul kha gdug pa dang /
NK003(ga)002:1468: sbyar dug la sogs pa thams cad kyis kyang mi tshugs shing med par 'gyur ro //
NK003(ga)002:1469: gzhan yang pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /
NK003(ga)002:1475: dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang /
NK003(ga)002:1478: duhkha'i gnod pa thams cad med par 'gyur ro //
NK003(ga)002:1479: yul der ltas ngan zhig byung na yang mchod rten dang /
NK003(ga)002:1480: sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis 'od zer chen po byung bas /
NK003(ga)002:1482: bkra mi shis pa thams cad bzlog par 'gyur ro //
NK003(ga)002:1483: gang gzhan zhig bsam pa ngan pas /
NK003(ga)002:1484: dmag dang chom rkun gyis gnod pa bya bar sems sam /
NK003(ga)002:1485: dgra rgol ba zhig byung na yang gnas der mchod rten de la 'od zer chen po 'byung ste /
NK003(ga)002:1486: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi me lce kun
NK003(ga)002:1487: tu 'bar bas bskor ba'i nang na dmag gi dpung
NK003(ga)002:1488: dang / mtshon cha'i char mngon par bstan pas /
NK003(ga)002:1489: pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad zhi zhing phyir bzlog par 'gyur ro //
NK003(ga)002:1490: lha rnams kyis kyang srung ba dang skyob pa byas te /
NK003(ga)002:1491: phyogs bzhir dpag tshad brgya tshun chad du mtshams bcad de bsrungs pas /
NK003(ga)002:1494: phyugs nad thams cad mi 'byung ngo //
NK003(ga)002:1496: chos ma yin par spyod pa med par 'gyur ro //
NK003(ga)002:1497: 'di la gsang sngags gzhan gyis bcad pa dang mnan par mi nus te /
NK003(ga)002:1498: gsang sngags thams cad kyi rtsa ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK003(ga)002:1499: zhes bya ba la sogs pa phan yon ji skad
NK003(ga)002:1500: bka' stsal pa thams cad che ge mo la sogs
NK003(ga)002:1501: pa'i sems can thams cad la 'phral du 'grub par
NK003(ga)002:1502: ci gnang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yang dag
NK003(ga)002:1503: pa tshad mar gyur pas ji ltar bka' stsal pa
NK003(ga)002:1504: bzhin du bden pa mngon sum du bstan par ci
NK003(ga)002:1505: gnang zhes lan gsum du gsol ba nan tan du
NK003(ga)002:1506: ci gnang / gdab bo // de nas bsgrub bya la khro bo mnol ba med pa dang /
NK003(ga)002:1507: bdud rtsi thabs sbyor gyi sngags rgyas bsrung ba dang /
NK003(ga)002:1508: go cha'i sngags kyis bsrung ba dang /
NK003(ga)002:1509: go bskon pa byas la btang /
NK003(ga)002:1510: de'i rjes su mchod pa gso ba'am spos la gtang rag gi mchod pa phul /
NK003(ga)002:1511: 'grub na sbyin sreg byas la bstod pa nas smon lam gdab pa'i bar dang /
NK003(ga)002:1512: phyi rol du phyogs kyi gtor ma sngar bzhin bya /
NK003(ga)002:1513: sngar gyi gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya dang lha
NK003(ga)002:1514: rang rang gi snying po'i sham du gats+tsha btags pa
NK003(ga)002:1515: brjod cing / mchod yon sbreng nas spyan drangs pa'i
NK003(ga)002:1516: lha gzhal yas khang dang bcas pa gshegs su gsol
NK003(ga)002:1517: brjod cing / / sngags kyis sprul pa'i lha dam tshig pa rnams rim gyis bdag la bsdu /
NK003(ga)002:1518: bdag gi lha'i sku gzugs zla ba'i steng gi yi ge la bsdu /
NK003(ga)002:1519: yi ge zla ba la bsdu /
NK003(ga)002:1520: zla ba rnam smin gyi lus la bsdus nas /
NK003(ga)002:1521: thog mar dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan ma rnams bsdu /
NK003(ga)002:1522: de nas gdan rnams bsdus te rdul tshon rnams phyags
NK003(ga)002:1523: la mchod rdzas dang dman pa rnams dang lhan cig
NK003(ga)002:1524: rgya mtsho chen por 'bab pa'i chu la dor bar
NK003(ga)002:1525: bya / bza' bca' rnams phongs pa rnams la sbyin
NK003(ga)002:1526: zhing khyi dang bya rog la cung zad tsam yang
NK003(ga)002:1527: bya / mi sbyin no // de nas sngar bshad pa bzhin gyi sngags rgyas ra ba dang /
NK003(ga)002:1529: phyogs mtshams bcings pa rnams bkrol la /
NK003(ga)002:1530: bdag nyid la go cha bskon te bsrung bar bya /
NK003(ga)002:1531: mjug tu bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa brjod do //
NK003(ga)002:1532: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdo 'don
NK003(ga)002:1533: par bya ste de ni 'chi ba bslu ba'i cho
NK003(ga)002:1534: ga'o // mchod rten gyis srog shing 'dzugs pa'i cho
NK003(ga)002:1535: ga byed par 'dod na bsnyen pa'i skabs su gzhan
NK003(ga)002:1537: bcom ldan 'das thub pa'i dod du byang chub sems
NK003(ga)002:1538: dpa' sgrib pa rnam sel gser mdog thor tshugs cod
NK003(ga)002:1539: pan can / phyag na yid bzhin gyi nor bu bsnams pa /
NK003(ga)002:1541: na mo b+ha ga wa te /
NK003(ga)002:1542: na ba na ba t+ai n+aam /
NK003(ga)002:1543: samyak+sam bud+d+ha ko ti ni yu ta sha ta sa ha sra n+aam /
NK003(ga)002:1544: na mahsarba n+ai wa ra na bi skam+bi ni bod+hi sa t+w+aa ya /
NK003(ga)002:1545: tu ru tu ru ma ma sarba +aa ba ra na bi shwa d+ha ni /
NK003(ga)002:1546: sarba ta th+aa ga ta a yurba la ni /
NK003(ga)002:1548: sarba sid+d+hi na ma skri t+w+aa /
NK003(ga)002:1550: sarba sat+w+aa a wa lo ki ni /
NK003(ga)002:1553: ma ma sarba p+aa pam bi shwa d+ha ni ku ru s+w+aa h+aa /
NK003(ga)002:1554: phyag rgya ni thal mo brkyang pa sbyar nas cung zad rtse mo bskum par byas pa'o //
NK003(ga)002:1555: bdag bskyed kyii skabs su gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya nas gnas pa'i phyag rgya'i bar mi dgos /
NK003(ga)002:1556: mdun du ye shes pa spyan 'dren pa na yang sgrib pa rnam sel nyid spyan drangs /
NK003(ga)002:1557: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi phyag
NK003(ga)002:1558: rgya bstan pa'i sngon du rang gi phyag rgya bstan
NK003(ga)002:1559: la sngags bzla / bzlas pa'i skabs su sngar gyi sngags gnyis po'i dod la /
NK003(ga)002:1560: rang gi sngags gcig po bzla /
NK003(ga)002:1561: gzhan sngar dang 'dra ba sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas /
NK003(ga)002:1562: dkyil 'khor sngar las khyad par ma gsungs kyang mtshan
NK003(ga)002:1563: ma 'god pa'i skabs su bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon
NK003(ga)002:1564: du sgrib pa rnam sel gyi mtshan ma yid bzhin
NK003(ga)002:1565: nor bu bkod na 'thad par mngon //
NK003(ga)002:1566: dkyil 'khor gyi snam bu'i gra bzhir bum pa bzhi
NK003(ga)002:1567: mi dgos pas de'i dod du dri'i chus gang ba'i
NK003(ga)002:1569: sngar snam bu'i nub tu 'god pa rnams lho ru 'god /
NK003(ga)002:1572: 'bras bsres nas btsos pa'i thug pa kri sa ra dang /
NK003(ga)002:1573: zas dkar gsum rnams bum pa'i nang du blug pa dang /
NK003(ga)002:1574: shing tog sna tshogs 'bras bu dgu bcu rtsa dgu rnams nub tu dgod /
NK003(ga)002:1575: byang du sngar gyi steng du spos dang me tog bsnan la dgod /
NK003(ga)002:1576: gzhan sngar dang 'dra bar sa chog nas sgrub mchod kyi bar khyad med par bya'o //
NK003(ga)002:1577: de nas sgrib sel gyi gzungs de nyid dgu bcu
NK003(ga)002:1578: rtsa dgu bris te srog shing gi phyogs bzhir gzhug
NK003(ga)002:1579: / 'od zer dri med kyi gzungs ril po bris nas srog shing gi nang du gzhug /
NK003(ga)002:1580: sngar gyi snying po'i sngags bris nas srog shing gi rtsa bar gzhug /
NK003(ga)002:1581: gtsug tor rnam rgyal gyi gzungs bris la srog shing
NK003(ga)002:1582: gi rtse mor bcug ste mchod rten gsar pa'am rnying
NK003(ga)002:1583: pa zhig ral gso ba'i dbus su btsugs la /
NK003(ga)002:1584: mchod rten de'i phyi rol gyi phyogs bzhir mchod pa tshang ba gtor ma dang bcas pa bsham /
NK003(ga)002:1585: de nas dkyil 'khor sgrub mchod tshar ba dang mchod
NK003(ga)002:1586: rten gyi phyogs bzhir phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa
NK003(ga)002:1587: thams cad dang / byang sems brgyad /
NK003(ga)002:1588: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon brgyad /
NK003(ga)002:1593: khyab 'jug rnams mngon sum du byon par bsgom ste /
NK003(ga)002:1595: phyag 'tshal ba mkhan po bod+hi sat+wa'i dri med kyi cho ga nas 'byung ba bzhin /
NK003(ga)002:1596: phyogs bzhi nas phyag bya ste /
NK003(ga)002:1597: bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrugs pa la sogs pa shar
NK003(ga)002:1598: phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
NK003(ga)002:1599: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag
NK003(ga)002:1601: de bzhin du rin po che tog la sogs pa
NK003(ga)002:1602: lho phyogs kyi 'od dpag med la sogs pa nub
NK003(ga)002:1603: phyogs kyi rnga sgra la sogs pa byang phyogs kyi
NK003(ga)002:1604: ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal la
NK003(ga)002:1605: sogs pa byang shar gyi pad+mo dam pa'i dpal la
NK003(ga)002:1606: sogs pa lho shar gyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang
NK003(ga)002:1607: ba dam pa'i dpal la sogs pa lho nub kyi
NK003(ga)002:1608: gdugs dam pa la sogs pa nub byang gi rnam
NK003(ga)002:1609: par snang mdzad la sogs pa 'og phyogs kyi ye
NK003(ga)002:1610: shes tog la sogs pa ste steng phyogs kyi da
NK003(ga)002:1611: ltar bdag cag gi ston pa sangs rgyas shwakya thub
NK003(ga)002:1612: pa gdul bya'i dbang gis dzam bu'i gling 'dir mya
NK003(ga)002:1613: ngan las 'das pa'i tshul bstan kyang 'jig rten gyi
NK003(ga)002:1614: khams gzhan dag na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par
NK003(ga)002:1615: rol pa / sna tshogs kyi 'gro ba'i don mdzad
NK003(ga)002:1616: cing bzhugs pa la 'phags pa byams pa la sogs
NK003(ga)002:1617: pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgyad
NK003(ga)002:1618: la gnod sbyin gyi dbang po nor bu bzang po
NK003(ga)002:1619: la sogs pa gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po
NK003(ga)002:1620: brgyad rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung ba dang
NK003(ga)002:1626: sred med kyi bu la zhes phyag byas la /
NK003(ga)002:1627: mchod yon sngon du 'gro ba'i nyer spyod lnga dang rol mos mchod /
NK003(ga)002:1628: gnod sbyin dang phyogs skyong la sogs pa rnams la
NK003(ga)002:1629: gtor ma byin la bstod pa ci shes pas bstod
NK003(ga)002:1630: de / 'og nas 'byung ba'i sngags nyi shu rtsa
NK003(ga)002:1631: brgyad brjod la pus mo btsug thal mo sbyar nas
NK003(ga)002:1633: ston pa bcom ldan 'das rgyal ba sh+aakya thub pa dang /
NK003(ga)002:1634: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bye ba phrag
NK003(ga)002:1635: dgu bcu rtsa dgu 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad
NK003(ga)002:1636: dang / byang chub sems dpa' nye ba'i sras brgyad dang /
NK003(ga)002:1637: khyad par du dpal gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje dang /
NK003(ga)002:1638: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po brgyad dang /
NK003(ga)002:1639: rgyal po chen po sde bzhi dang /
NK003(ga)002:1642: sred med kyi bu la sogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol /
NK003(ga)002:1643: bdag cag gis 'phags pa 'od zer dri ma med
NK003(ga)002:1644: pa rnam par dag pa'i 'od kyi gzungs las 'byung
NK003(ga)002:1645: ba'i cho ga bzhin 'phags pa gdan 'dzom par mdzad
NK003(ga)002:1646: pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhengs su gsol te 'phags pa rnams
NK003(ga)002:1647: spyan drangs nas mchod cing gsol ba btab pa dang
NK003(ga)002:1648: / mchod rten gyi srog shing btsug pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis /
NK003(ga)002:1649: 'phags pa thams cad kyis mchod rten 'di chos kyi sku ru byin gyis brlabs te /
NK003(ga)002:1650: ring bsrel dang ldan par mdzad nas /
NK003(ga)002:1651: mchod rten la mchod pa dang rim gro byed cing srog shing brtan par mdzad du gsol /
NK003(ga)002:1652: che ge mo la sogs pa'i sems can thams cad
NK003(ga)002:1653: kyi sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad byang zhing
NK003(ga)002:1654: dag nas / tshe ring zhing nad med pa dang /
NK003(ga)002:1655: bar chad kyi bgegs thams cad dang bral ba dang /
NK003(ga)002:1656: mthar bla na med pa'i byang chub myur du thob par byin gyis brlab tu gsol /
NK003(ga)002:1657: sngon bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces /
NK003(ga)002:1661: dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig gis bsod nams kyi 'bras bu chen po thob cing /
NK003(ga)002:1662: yon tan thob par 'dod pas gsang sngags kyi rgyal
NK003(ga)002:1663: po'i cho ga sngar bstan pa bzhin du bya ste
NK003(ga)002:1664: / dgu bcu rtsa dgu yi ger bris la /
NK003(ga)002:1665: sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten gyi mdun du dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byas la ba'i lci bas byugs te /
NK003(ga)002:1666: gra bzhir dri'i chu phor pu bkang ba re re bzhag /
NK003(ga)002:1667: bdug spos kyi snod du ba 'thul ba yang bzhag nas /
NK003(ga)002:1668: snod chen po'i nang du me tog dang /
NK003(ga)002:1671: 'di rnams bum pa'i nang du blugs pa dang /
NK003(ga)002:1672: yang shing tog sna tshogs 'bras bu dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang /
NK003(ga)002:1673: kha zas ming gis smos pa 'di rnams dang /
NK003(ga)002:1674: spos dang me tog la sogs pa dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bkram la /
NK003(ga)002:1675: gsang sngags kyi yi ge mchod rten gyi srog shing
NK003(ga)002:1676: gi nang du bcug nas mchod rten gyi phyogs bzhir
NK003(ga)002:1677: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon sum
NK003(ga)002:1678: du dmigs te phyag byas la sems rtse gcig pas
NK003(ga)002:1679: gsang sngags 'di dag gdon par bya'o //
NK003(ga)002:1683: pra ba re dzi na pa re /
NK003(ga)002:1685: sarba ta th+aa ga ta d+h+aa tu gar+b+he /
NK003(ga)002:1687: a ya ta to ba ni s+w+aa h+aa /
NK003(ga)002:1688: sarba de ba ni ba ha ya bi bud+d+ha a d+hish+tha na sa ma ye s+w+aa h+aa /
NK003(ga)002:1689: bdug spos 'thul ba rgyun mi chad par bya zhing /
NK003(ga)002:1690: gsang sngags lan nyi shu rtsa brgyad bton na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgyad dang /
NK003(ga)002:1691: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po brgyad dang /
NK003(ga)002:1693: rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /
NK003(ga)002:1696: sred med kyi bu rnams de'i mod la mchod rten de la mchod pa dang /
NK003(ga)002:1697: rim gro byed de srog shing brtan par byed do //
NK003(ga)002:1698: de bas gong du yang sangs rgyas bye ba 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang /
NK003(ga)002:1699: gad+g+aa'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang gnas der gshegs te /
NK003(ga)002:1700: mchod rten de la mchod pa dang //
NK003(ga)002:1701: chos kyi skur byin gyis rlob cing ring bsrel dang ldan par mdzad do //
NK003(ga)002:1702: de ltar sems thag pa nas cho ga tshul bzhin du byas na yon tan de dag dang /
NK003(ga)002:1703: gzhan yang mchod rten de yid bzhin gyi nor bu
NK003(ga)002:1704: rin po che las byas pa'i bsod nams thob par
NK003(ga)002:1705: 'gyur te / rin po che'i rnam pa bye ba
NK003(ga)002:1706: phrag khrig brgya stong du ma las mchod rten byas
NK003(ga)002:1708: dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po dang ldan zhing
NK003(ga)002:1709: lus rnam par dag pa tshe ring zhing nad med
NK003(ga)002:1710: pa dang / bgegs thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro //
NK003(ga)002:1711: gang gzhan la la zhig gis mchod rten 'di mthong ngam /
NK003(ga)002:1712: mchod rten de'i dril bu'i sgra thos na yang las
NK003(ga)002:1713: kyi sgrib pa dang sdig pa thams cad byang bar
NK003(ga)002:1714: 'gyur te / mtshams med pa lnga byas pa yang
NK003(ga)002:1715: yongs su byang nas 'chi ba'i dus byas pa'i 'og
NK003(ga)002:1716: tu bde ba can gyi 'jig rten du skye'o //
NK003(ga)002:1717: gang la la zhig gis mchod rten de'i ming tsam
NK003(ga)002:1718: thos pa yang 'chi ba'i dus byas nas bla na
NK003(ga)002:1719: med pa'i byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur /
NK003(ga)002:1720: tha na bya dang ri dwags la sogs pa'i sems
NK003(ga)002:1721: can gang gis mthong ba de yang tshe 'phos nas
NK003(ga)002:1723: bsod nams dang ldan pa'i lus thob par 'gyur ro //
NK003(ga)002:1724: zhes bka' stsal ba'i phan yon thams cad che ge
NK003(ga)002:1725: la sogs pa'i sems can thams cad la 'phral du
NK003(ga)002:1727: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yang dag pa tshad mar
NK003(ga)002:1728: gyur pas ji ltar bka' stsal pa bzhin du bden
NK003(ga)002:1729: pa mngon sum du bstan pa ci gnang /
NK003(ga)002:1730: zhes lan gsum gsol ba nan tan du gdab bo //
NK003(ga)002:1731: de bzhin du mchod rten gyi phyogs bzhi ka nas tshar re re byas la /
NK003(ga)002:1732: 'jug tu bkra shis dang smon lam rgyas par gdab bo //
NK003(ga)002:1733: dkyil 'khor gyi 'jug gi bya ba rnams snga ma ltar bya ste /
NK003(ga)002:1735: yang tshogs rdzogs shing sdig pa dag par 'dod pas
NK003(ga)002:1736: bsnyen gnas dkyil 'khor sgrub mchod kyi bar bstan ma
NK003(ga)002:1737: thag pa dang 'dra bar byas la /
NK003(ga)002:1738: sngar gyi srog shing gi sngags dang /
NK003(ga)002:1740: sgrib pa rnam sel gyi gzungs dang /
NK003(ga)002:1741: srog shing brtan par byed pa'i gzungs bzhi po re re bzhin dgu bcu rtsa dgu bris la /
NK003(ga)002:1742: de nang du bcug pa'i s+aats+tsha dgu bcu rtsa dgu byas te /
NK003(ga)002:1743: 'og nas 'chad pa'i na mo na ba na ba t+ai n+aam la sogs pa'i sngags bris la /
NK003(ga)002:1744: mchod rten gyi 'phang lo'i nang du gzhug /
NK003(ga)002:1745: dkyil 'khor gyi snam bu'i steng nas mar bzhugs su gsol /
NK003(ga)002:1746: dkyil 'khor du shong ba med na dkyil 'khor gyi
NK003(ga)002:1747: mtha' bskor du pad+ma'i gdan byas la bzhugs su gsol
NK003(ga)002:1748: / zhi ba snying po'i gzhung ngam mkhan po bo
NK003(ga)002:1749: d+hi sa t+wa'i gzhung bzhin du mchod rten gyi mnga'
NK003(ga)002:1750: gsol ba dang mchod pa rgya cher bya /
NK003(ga)002:1751: bskor ba lan bdun bya zhing /
NK003(ga)002:1752: 'og nas 'byung ba'i sngags na mo na ba la sogs brgya rtsa'am dgu bcu rtsa dgu bton la /
NK003(ga)002:1753: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
NK003(ga)002:1754: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh+aakya thub pa
NK003(ga)002:1755: la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams
NK003(ga)002:1756: cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dang /
NK003(ga)002:1757: phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
NK003(ga)002:1758: 'phags pa chos skyong ba'i tshogs thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol /
NK003(ga)002:1759: bdag gis 'phags pa 'od zer dri ma med pa
NK003(ga)002:1760: rnam par dag pa 'od kyi gzungs nas 'byung ba'i
NK003(ga)002:1761: cho ga bzhin / 'phags pa rnams gdan 'dzom pa'i
NK003(ga)002:1762: pho brang gi dkyil 'khor bzhengs te 'phags pa rnams
NK003(ga)002:1763: spyan drangs nas mchod cing bstod nas bzlas brjod bgyis
NK003(ga)002:1764: cho ga bzhin / pa dang / gsang sngags bzhi
NK003(ga)002:1765: po re re bzhin nang du bcug pa'i mchod rten
NK003(ga)002:1766: dgu bcu rtsa dgu bgyis te /
NK003(ga)002:1767: gsang sngags yi ger bris nas mchod rten gyi 'phang
NK003(ga)002:1768: lor bcug pa'i mchod rten bgyis te mchod cing bstod
NK003(ga)002:1769: nas bskor ba byas shing gzungs bzlas pa'i mthus /
NK003(ga)002:1770: che ge la sogs pa'i sems cad thams cad kyi sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad byang zhing /
NK003(ga)002:1771: gnod pa dang sdug bsngal thams cad zhi nas phan
NK003(ga)002:1772: bde bla na med pa'i byang chub thob pa'i dngos
NK003(ga)002:1774: sngon gsang ba'i bdag po la dpal gyi mgur nas 'di skad du /
NK003(ga)002:1775: gang la la zhig gis pha rol tu phyin pa
NK003(ga)002:1776: drug yongs su rdzogs par spyod par 'dod pa des
NK003(ga)002:1777: snga ma bzhin du dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas
NK003(ga)002:1778: te / sa dang lci bas byugs la de'i steng du spos kyi rkyang nul gyis byugs te /
NK003(ga)002:1779: dkyil 'khor gyi grwa bzhir dri'i chus bkang ba'i snod re re bzhag la /
NK003(ga)002:1780: sngar bstan pa'i gsang sngags bzhi po dag las rnam pa gcig kyang dgu bcu rtsa dgu bris te /
NK003(ga)002:1781: rang gi lag gis mchod rten chung ngu dgu bcu
NK003(ga)002:1782: rtsa dgu gdab cing gsang sngags rnams kyang re re
NK003(ga)002:1784: de nas yang gsang sngags 'di dgu bcu rtsa dgu
NK003(ga)002:1785: yi ger bris te mchod rten gyi 'phang lo rnams
NK003(ga)002:1787: mchod rten rnams dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag ste /
NK003(ga)002:1788: me tog dang byugs pas mchod la /
NK003(ga)002:1789: lan bdun bdun bskor zhing gsang sngags 'di yang gdon par bya'o //
NK003(ga)002:1790: na mo na ba na ba t+ai n+aam /
NK003(ga)002:1791: ta th+aa ga ta gang+g+aa nam di /
NK003(ga)002:1793: ko ti ni yu ta sha ta sa ha s+r+aa n+aam /
NK003(ga)002:1796: mo ri go ri tsa la b+aa ri s+w+aa h+aa /
NK003(ga)002:1797: cho ga 'di ltar spyad na pha rol tu phyin
NK003(ga)002:1798: pa drug yongs su rdzogs par spyad par yang ma
NK003(ga)002:1799: zad de / des ni rin po che'i mchod rten
NK003(ga)002:1800: bye ba phrag khrig brgya stong gang+g+aa'i klung gi bye
NK003(ga)002:1802: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag
NK003(ga)002:1803: khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu snyed la
NK003(ga)002:1804: mchod cing bsnyen bkur byas par 'gyur ro //
NK003(ga)002:1805: de'i gong du yang lha thams cad kyis mchod pa'i sprin sna tshogs bsdus te /
NK003(ga)002:1806: mchod rten de la yo byad sna tshogs sbyar nas /
NK003(ga)002:1807: de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang dang /
NK003(ga)002:1808: yo byad sna tshogs sbyar nas mchod par 'gyur te /
NK003(ga)002:1809: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag snyed
NK003(ga)002:1810: kyis mkhyen cing gzigs te byin gyis rlob par mdzad
NK003(ga)002:1811: do // rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i
NK003(ga)002:1812: dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po'i bsod nams dang
NK003(ga)002:1813: do // / yon tan thams cad thob par mdzad do //
NK003(ga)002:1814: yang gang la la zhig gis gsang sngags kyi rgyal
NK003(ga)002:1815: po 'di'i snying po ma nor bar yi ger bris
NK003(ga)002:1816: la rtag tu bton te mchod pa'i las byas la
NK003(ga)002:1817: lus la thogs na rig pa de nyid kyis bsrung
NK003(ga)002:1818: ba dang bskyab pa mdzad de /
NK003(ga)002:1819: phas kyi rgol ba'i dgra thams cad dang /
NK003(ga)002:1823: yi dwags la sogs pa thams cad kyis kyang gnod pa byed par mi 'gyur te /
NK003(ga)002:1824: 'jigs shing skrag nas so sor 'byer bar 'gyur ro //
NK003(ga)002:1825: gang la la zhig gis rig pa 'don pa de dang gtam byas pa yang /
NK003(ga)002:1826: mtshams med pa lnga'i las kyi sgrib pa yang yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur ro //
NK003(ga)002:1827: gang la la zhig gis sngags de'i sgra thos sam /
NK003(ga)002:1829: lus la reg kyang rung ste /
NK003(ga)002:1830: de'i tshe rabs gzhan gyi las kyi sgrib pa dang /
NK003(ga)002:1831: sdig pa thams cad yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur ro //
NK003(ga)002:1832: gang rig pa 'don pa de'i lus la dug gis mi tshugs /
NK003(ga)002:1835: gdon thams cad kyis kyang glags mi rnyed /
NK003(ga)002:1837: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsrung ba dang /
NK003(ga)002:1839: spyan ras kyis 'tsho bar mdzad do //
NK003(ga)002:1841: dam tshig can thams cad kyis kyang de la sdong grogs byed par 'gyur te /
NK003(ga)002:1844: sbyor ba ngan pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro //
NK003(ga)002:1845: de lta bas na rig pa 'don pa gnas gang na 'dug kyang /
NK003(ga)002:1846: gsang sngags 'di'i cho ga don du gnyer bar bya ste /
NK003(ga)002:1847: gsang sngags yi ger bris la lam gyi gzhi mado'am /
NK003(ga)002:1849: skye bo mang po phan tshun 'gro ba'i gnas su mchod rten byas la /
NK003(ga)002:1850: de'i nang du bcug na 'gro ba thams cad dang /
NK003(ga)002:1853: tha na grog sbur yan chad kyis mthong ba dang /
NK003(ga)002:1856: de la phog pa'i sa dang /
NK003(ga)002:1859: grib mas phog na yang byol song dang /
NK003(ga)002:1861: ngan song log par ltung ba sems can dmyal bar
NK003(ga)002:1862: skye bar 'gyur ba'i sdig pa thams cad dang bral
NK003(ga)002:1863: zhing / 'chi ba'i dus byas nas bde 'gro mtho
NK003(ga)002:1864: ris lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te
NK003(ga)002:1865: zhing / / sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa yongs
NK003(ga)002:1866: su byang nas tshe rabs rjes su dran pa thob
NK003(ga)002:1867: zhing / / par 'gyur zhing / phyir mi ltung ba'i chos can du 'gyur ro //
NK003(ga)002:1868: zhes bka' stsal ba'i phan yon thams cad che ge
NK003(ga)002:1869: mo la sogs pa'i sems can thams cad la phral
NK003(ga)002:1871: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yang dag pa'i tshad mar gyur pas /
NK003(ga)002:1872: ji ltar bka' stsal pa bzhin du /
NK003(ga)002:1873: bden pa mngon sum du bstan pa ci gnang /
NK003(ga)002:1874: zhes lan gsum gsol ba nan tan du gdab bo //
NK003(ga)002:1875: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi mjug gi cho ga thams cad snga ma dang 'dra ba yin te /
NK003(ga)002:1877: bya rgyud rin chen 'byung gnas las //
NK003(ga)002:1878: 'od zer dri med nor bu blangs //
NK003(ga)002:1879: spyi rgyud bzhi yis byi dor byas //
NK003(ga)002:1880: legs bshad rgyal mtshan rtser mchod pa'i //
NK003(ga)002:1881: dge bas 'gro ba ma lus pa //
NK003(ga)002:1882: rnam grol rin chen gling gi bdag /
NK003(ga)002:1883: yon tan ro 'dzin nyi stong ldan //
NK003(ga)002:1884: kun mkhyen gdengs can grub gyur cig /
NK003(ga)002:1885: 'di la nongs pa'i tshogs mchis na //
NK003(ga)002:1886: bla ma rnams dang lhag pa'i lha //
NK003(ga)002:1887: bya ba'i rgyud la mkhas rnams kyis //
NK003(ga)002:1888: bzod pa'i me yis gzhom du gsol //
NK003(ga)002:1889: 'phags pa 'od zer dri ma med pa rnam par
NK003(ga)002:1890: dag pa'i 'od kyi gzungs las dkyil 'khor gyi cho
NK003(ga)002:1891: ga gsungs pa las slob dpon byang chub mchog gis
NK003(ga)002:1892: mdzad pa'i bya ba spyi'i sgrub thabs su bsdus pa
NK003(ga)002:1893: dang / bya ba spyi'i rgyud rnam pa bzhi nas kha bskang zhing /
NK003(ga)002:1894: ma tshang ba dag 'jam dpal rtsa rgyud dang /
NK003(ga)002:1895: don zhags cho ga zhi ba mo dang /
NK003(ga)002:1896: phyag rdor rig pa mchog gi rgyud la sogs pa
NK003(ga)002:1897: bya ba'i rgyud sde che ba rnams nas cung zad
NK003(ga)002:1898: kha bskang ste / dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga nyung bsdus su bsdebs pa 'di /
NK003(ga)002:1901: man ngag gi yon tan du mas phyug par gyur
NK003(ga)002:1902: pa bla ma chos rje khro phu lo ts+aa ba'i
NK003(ga)002:1903: dbon mkhan po bsod nams seng+ge dang /
NK003(ga)002:1904: rgyud sde rin po che du mas rgyud phyug cing /
NK003(ga)002:1905: khyad par dus kyi 'khor lo'i phyi nang gsang gsum
NK003(ga)002:1906: la mi 'jigs pa'i spobs pa can dge ba'i bshes
NK003(ga)002:1907: gnyen yar lung pa nam mkha' blo gros gnyis kyis
NK003(ga)002:1908: cho ga 'di sngar ma dar bas lag tu blang
NK003(ga)002:1909: dka' bar 'dug pas yig cha zhig cis kyang gyis
NK003(ga)002:1910: / nged kyis sbyin bdag dad pa can rnams la
NK003(ga)002:1911: bskul ma byas la mchod rten bzheng du gzhug go
NK003(ga)002:1913: dge slong rin chen grub kyis kun ldan gyi lo /
NK003(ga)002:1914: gro zhun can gyi zla ba'i nyi shu brgyad la
NK003(ga)002:1915: sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni de nyid la nye
NK003(ga)002:1916: bar gnas pa'i dge slong bsod nams grub bo //
